name: Yannick Meine
body:
Here you will find a set of links to my [active IT projects](#active-projects), with quick description, hoping that you can easily find something interesting.

In addition you can see what are the plans for my [future projects](#idead).

# Active projects

* [OOP](https://github.com/ymeine/oop): OOP and raw objects manipulation library, creating types and fluent API
* [HTTP Server](https://github.com/ymeine/http-server): an abstraction of a HTTP server (using lower-level libraries), centered on the concept of routes

# Ideas

* __STD Utils__: a small custom standard library (for strings, native arrays, numbers, native types, ...)
* __Collections__: arrays, objects, graphs, indexes, etc. are all collections.
* __Graph library__: the graph is a specific kind of collection, more complex, with more properties, rules, ...
* __Documentation generator for the [OOP library](https://github.com/ymeine/oop)__: generating documentation files from introspection of OOP elements specifications
* ...
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
